menu.category_description: All starters served with dipping sauce

items.description: 6 Mozzarella sticks

items.description: 10 jalapeno poppers

items.description: Pepperoni and Cream Cheese

items.name: Supreme
items.description: Pepperoni, hamburger, sausage, onions, green peppers, black olives, mushrooms

items.name: Add a Meat Topping
items.description: Hamburger, pepperoni, sausage, Canadian bacon

items.name: Add a Vegetable Topping
items.description: Onion, green peppers, black olives, mushrooms, banana peppers

menu.category_description: Sugar-free syrup and jelly upon request
menu.category_warning: * Consuming raw or undercooked animal products may increase your chance of food borne illness.

items.name: Depot Breakfast Plate *
items.description: Bacon, ham, sausage, or Cajun sausage, 2 eggs your way, hash browns, white, wheat, or rye toast

items.name: Country Fried Steak Breakfast
items.description: Country fried steak, 2 eggs your way, hash browns, white, wheat, or rye toast

items.name: Pancakes
items.description: 3 pancakes (plain, blueberry, or chocolate chip) served with butter and syrup

items.name: Biscuits and Gravy
items.description: 2 biscuits with sausage gravy and two eggs your way

items.name: Breakfast Burrito
items.description: Scrambled eggs, hash browns, Colby Jack cheese, sausage, and bacon wrapped in a tortilla (Served with sides of sour cream and salsa)

items.name: Breakfast Casserole
items.description: Biscuit topped with scrambled eggs, hash browns, sausage gravy, cheese, and your choice of sausage, bacon or ham

items.name: Omelet
items.description: 3 eggs, 3 fillings of your choice (sausage, bacon, ham, green pepper, onion, tomato, cheese, mushroom), hash browns, white, wheat, or rye toast

items.name: French Toast
items.description: 4 half slices of French toast made with Texas toast, white or wheat bread, sprinkled with powdered sugar

menu.category_description:
Upgrade to onion rings for $3 or sweet potato fries for $2
Potato chips instead of fries on request
Extra dipping sauce for $.50
menu.category_warning: * Consuming raw or undercooked animal products may increase your chance of food borne illness.

items.name: Depot Burger*
items.description: 5 oz patty, bun, special sauce, Cheddar cheese, caramelized onions, bacon, pickles, fries

items.name: Western BBQ Burger*
items.description: 5 oz patty, bun, bacon, cheddar cheese, caramelized onions, BBQ sauce, fries

items.name: Depot Deeper
items.description: Roast beef, American and Cheddar cheese on Parmesan crusted bread, brown gravy, fries

items.name: Cheeseburger*
items.description: 5 oz patty, bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, fries. (Swiss, Pepper Jack, Cheddar, or American cheese) Add bacon for additional $1.50

items.name: Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Grilled or breaded chicken breast, Swiss cheese, caramelized onions, bacon, honey mustard, special sauce, bun, fries

items.name: Depot Salad
items.description: Grilled or breaded chicken, mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, Parmesan cheese, club crackers, dressing (ranch, blue cheese, mango vinaigrette, Dorothy Lynch (French), honey mustard, Thousand Island)

items.name: Southwest Chicken Salad
items.description: Grilled or breaded chicken, mixed greens, black beans, corn, tomatoes, onion, cheddar cheese, tortilla strips and jalapeno ranch

items.name: Chicken Finger Basket
items.description: Breaded chicken tenders plain or tossed in Frank's Red Hot sauce, fries, dipping sauce

items.name: Fish Basket
items.description: Crispy fried fish, fries, homemade tartar sauce (Malt Vinegar on request)

items.name: Patty Melt
items.description: 5 oz hamburger patty, caramelized onions, Swiss cheese, special sauce, marble rye bread, pickle spear, fries

items.name: Hot Roast Beef Sandwich
items.description: Shredded roast beef on white bread with mashed potatoes, covered in brown gravy (Add chef's choice veggie for $2)

items.name: Reuben Sandwich
items.description: Corned beef, sauerkraut, Swiss cheese, Thousand Island sauce, marble rye bread, pickle spear, fries

items.name: Pork Fritter
items.description: Breaded pork tenderloin with mashed potatoes, white or brown gravy, chef’s choice veggie, roll, butter (Add a side salad for $3.50)

items.name: Breaded Pork Sandwich
items.description: Fried pork loin, bun, mayo, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickle, fries

items.name: Grinder

items.name: Philly
items.description: Beef, Swiss cheese, roasted onions and peppers on a 6” hoagie, fries

items.name: BLT
items.description: Bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on white bread, fries

items.name: Meatloaf
items.description: Caramelized onion and bacon meatloaf served with mashed potatoes, chef's choice veggie and a roll, finished with pan gravy (Add a side salad for $3.50)

items.name: Chicken Fried Chicken
items.description: Chicken fried chicken with mashed potatoes, white or brown gravy, chef's choice veggie, roll, butter (Add a side salad for $3.50)

items.description: Country fried steak with mashed potatoes, white or brown gravy, chef's choice veggie, roll, butter (Add a side salad for $3.50)
